Uses of Package
net.metarelate.terminology.exceptions

Packages that use net.metarelate.terminology.exceptions
net.metarelate.terminology.auth Manages authorization. 
net.metarelate.terminology.commandline   
net.metarelate.terminology.coreModel This is the core of the Terminology Model and the overall conceptualization id described in the main documentation, that we refer to http://reference.metoffice.gov.uk/data/wmo/docs/. 
net.metarelate.terminology.exceptions Exception used in the system. 
net.metarelate.terminology.instanceManager   
net.metarelate.terminology.management Different classes that controls actions on the Terminology Manager. 
net.metarelate.terminology.modelBuilders Controls the construction of a terminology model from RDF 
net.metarelate.terminology.publisher Components to drive the rendering and publication of the terminology 
net.metarelate.terminology.publisher.templateElements Template elements used by the template manager. 
net.metarelate.terminology.utils   
net.metarelate.terminology.webedit   
 

Classes in net.metarelate.terminology.exceptions used by net.metarelate.terminology.auth
ConfigurationException
          Exception representing a configuration error.
ModelException
          Represents an inconsistency of the terminology model (e.g.: multiple fathers)

          Registry Manager Exception Thrown when an unauthorized operation is requested.
